attributes.action: Enforce cardiff council and other councils to scan all animals including cats
attributes.background: Enforce laws that all animals reported deceased on highways and roads are attended to and scanned by the council of the area. Animals to be stored and give owners a chance of closure. Do not allow animals to be thrown away like rubbish and nothing to be done. Causing constant heart heart.

rejection.details:
Petitions addressed to local authorities should be sent to the authority concerned:
https://www.gov.uk/find-local-council

If you wish the law to be changed so that new statutory duties are placed on local authorities regarding animals killed on the roads, you can submit a further petition making this clear.
